reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa4.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Permission Sets' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Permission Sets dialog'.
Click the 'Add' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add a new permission set dialog'.
Enter '5c4e373097a3460' in the 'Permission Set Name' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Permission Sets dialog'.
Verify success message of '5c4e373097a3460 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the Permission Set 'Edit' link for set name + '5c4e373097a3460'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit permission set 5c4e373097a3460 dialog'.
Verify all permission checkboxes are not checked.
Click the 'Export' tab.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Export permission set 5c4e373097a3460 dialog'.
Click the 'Edit' tab.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit permission set 5c4e373097a3460 dialog'.
Check the 'stick to Acquia web node' checkbox.
Check the 'access administration menu' checkbox.
Check the 'flush caches' checkbox.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Permission Sets dialog'.
Verify success message of '5c4e373097a3460 has been updated.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the Permission Set 'Edit' link for set name + '5c4e373097a3460'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit permission set 5c4e373097a3460 dialog'.
Click the 'Export' tab.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Export permission set 5c4e373097a3460 dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Permission Sets' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Permission Sets dialog'.
Click the Permission Set expand link for Set Name + '5c4e373097a3460'.
Click the Permission Set 'Delete' link for Set Name + '5c4e373097a3460'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Are you sure you want to delete 5c4e373097a3460? dialog'.
Click the 'Delete' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Permission Sets dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The item has been deleted.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify Permission Set '5c4e373097a3460' is NOT present.
